description: Would you like to ERASE 10 YEARS of aging?Now you can have smooth, baby-soft GLOWING skin in less than a week!Every day, your skin is exposed to sun, pollution, bacteria, free radicals, and other damaging elements.Your body works overtime to defend itself against these harmful irritants but despite it's best efforts, your face WILL age prematurely over time.It's a universal condition. You look at yourself every day in the mirror yet fail to notice the very subtle changes in your appearance. Then one day, you will see a photograph of yourself 10 years ago and gasp in horror at how much you have aged.Looking younger with Poppy Austin in 2014At Poppy Austin, we know how important it is to reverse the ravages of time, which is why we are are dedicated to making YOU look and feel beautiful in your skin again.Poppy Austin Vitamin C Serum• This bottle is TWICE the size (60 ml / 2 fl oz) of ALL other equivalent products• Contains the purest form of active, bio-available Vitamin C Serum on the market• Suitable for daily use on ALL skin types, including sensitive and combination skin• Perfect for those looking for a safe, 100% natural alternative to Botox or surgeryThis product comes with a full 30 day MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.[CUSTOMER NOTICE: JUL 2014]:We apologize for the limited stocks of our Vitamin C Serum. Demand has far outstripped supply in 2014. If you see the green 'In Stock' text above, please order today to avoid disappointment.
